sentences.sContent: Philosophy is a study that lets us be unhappy more intelligently.
sentences.sContent_eng: Philosophy is a study that lets us be unhappy more intelligently.
sentences.sCn: 哲学是让我们更聪明地不快乐的一门学问。

sentences.sContent: Maybe your relationships will be your primary focus for a period of life, as well as learning how to cultivate them more intimately and intelligently.
sentences.sContent_eng: Maybe your relationships will be your primary focus for a period of life, as well as learning how to cultivate them more intimately and intelligently.
sentences.sCn: 或许生活中的一段时期，你的主要焦点是人际关系，了解怎样聪明地培养人际亲密关系成为了关注点。

words.tran: 智能的；聪明的；理解力强的
知识分子；凭理智做事者
智力；情报工作；情报机关；理解力
